title: About the rewards..
body: Do i need to get rewards for being lvl 30? from what i have understand players get the rewards from 1-30 level ups too doesnt it work like that...? or am i being mistaken?

replies.body: You don't get the rewards from 1-30 if you're already level 30. Some of the rioter's mentioned in boards posts that, essentially, players who were level 30 already got their rewards in the form of all the IP they had previously earned.
